subject: Gymnastics
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: John Orozco, 19, has one more chance for a medal after he struggled on the pommel horse, then fell on his vault during the men’s team finals. “Oh, I’ll bounce back,” he said.
snippet: John Orozco, 19, has one more chance for a medal after he struggled on the pommel horse, then fell on his vault during the men’s team finals. “Oh, I’ll bounce back,” he said.
